summary: Provides the base functionality and properties required to create an entity that can be used to provide a visual representation of an [Entity](/documentation/Entity).
remarks: The asset class should not be directly instantiated. Instead, a class should be derived from it to provide specific functionality to that type of asset.

properties.name: loaded
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the asset has been loaded.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: An abstract method with the purpose of drawing the asset to the [Layer](/documentation/Layer) that the owning [Entity](/documentation/Entity) exists on.

methods.name: load
methods.description: An abstract method with the purpose of loading the asset.

methods.name: onLoad
methods.description: The function to be called when the asset has finished loading.

methods.name: prepare
methods.description: Prepare the information required to load the asset.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
platforms.notes: In addition to these tested browsers, the Asset class is supported by any browser that supports the HTML5 canvas.
